title: 【PVP地图制作者福音】快捷设置PVP必要成分
author: hsk040718
txt_content:
嗨~各位好~这里是Keyboard工作室弄出的小东西~
废话不多说，先放代码
summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~1 ~ ~-7 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"gamerule keepInventory true"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"scoreboard objectives add Health health Health"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"scoreboard objectives add Death deathCount Death"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar Deaths"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"scoreboard objectives setdisplay list Health"}}}}}}}}
复制代码这些代码设置的分别是：

生命值查看、死亡数查看、死亡不掉落

这是PVP基本元素，然而我会告诉你必须用1.8么。。


复制代码到命令方块就好了
